metadata.title: CVE-2019-19814 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted f2fs filesystem image cancause __remove_dirty_segment slab-out-of-bounds write access because anarray is bounded by the number of dirty types (8) but the array index canexceed this.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-01-09').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4, was needs-triage').
